name: Solutions Ad Manager
author: Solutions by Steve

sections.description:
Solutions Ad Manager is a simple ad manager that allows you to display advertisements in the form of pictures, YouTube videos, and many more embeddable elements in to a widget. This plugin comes with builtin analytics to track how many clicks you get for each ad.

This plugin is free to use and comes with the GPLv2 or later license. With that said this plugin lives solely on donations. If there is no monetary value in coding this plugin than development will cease to exist. If you would like you can donate here or use the button below.

If you would like to make requests for specific features please feel free to do so at https://solutionsbysteve.com/contact/ Remember, these are simply requests and no guarantee that it will fit in to the scope of the plugin but will absolutely be taken into consideration.

Chances are you are selling these ad spaces to people on your website. If you are making money of off my hard work and dedication then maybe you would like to share a little of the appreciation with the developer.

Donations
Please feel free to make feature requests with your donations. DO NOTE: these are simply requests and no guarantee that it will fit in to the scope of the plugin but will absolutely be taken into consideration.

https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=CZEPP9YUEPMW2&lc=US&item_name=Solutions%20By%20Steve&item_number=SoultionsAdManager&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donateCC_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted

Expectations for Feature Releases
Shortcodes – WIP
Better Analytics and Integration with Google Analytics
Custom Styles
sections.installation:
1. Extract solutions-ad-manager.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Display your ads by editing your widgets
sections.faq:
How to use Solutions Ad Manager

Create an Ad
Create a Group
Add your ads to the Group
Select Widgets under Appearance
Choose the widget you would like to display
How to show titles and controls on YouTube videos
Select Options.
Choose the options you would like under “YouTube Options”.
Press Save

How to show titles and controls on YouTube videos

Select Options.
Choose the options you would like under “YouTube Options”.
Press Save

How to backup your ads

Ads can be backed up by using the Export feature that comes with WordPress. And if you need to restore them use the Import feature that comes with WordPress.

How to make feature requests

If you would like to make requests for specific features please feel free to do so at https://solutionsbysteve.com/contact/ Remember, these are simply requests and no guarantee that it will fit in to the scope of the plugin but will absolutely be taken into consideration.

How to Donate

Donations are the foundation of this plugin, without them it will cease to exist. Thank you for your consideration and it is truly appreciated.
https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=CZEPP9YUEPMW2&lc=US&item_name=Solutions%20By%20Steve&item_number=SoultionsAdManager&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donateCC_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Updated Metaboxes to CMB2 – https://github.com/CMB2/CMB2
  • Lots of code cleanup

0.9.0

  • Make image links nofollow so they are not being used on facebook and twitter
  • Change schedule name to something more specific (Ex. solutions_ad_manager_update)

0.8.2

  • Now using tax_query for WP_Query, should fix issues with WordPress 4.4.1 update

0.8.1

  • Fix issues with breadcrumbs

0.8.0

  • Ads can now expire after a set time
  • Add support for existing post updates
  • Cron jobs for background updates to ads

0.7.0

  • Add Shortcode support

0.6.4

  • Bugfix on Ad Query

0.6

  • Prep for Release

0.5

  • Remove thumbnails from admin column view
  • Fix Group Display on widgets

0.4

  • Fixed Settings Name
  • Fixed Sort by Clicks
  • Made custom embed more OOP

0.3

  • Fixed includes
  • Fixed featured image

0.2

  • Support for YouTube videos
  • Add options page
  • Specific Ad Widget

0.1

  • Beta Release.

short_description: A simple ad manager that allows you to display pictures and YouTube videos in to a widget.

upgrade_notice.0.9.0: 0.9.0 Schedule name was changed, it is recommended that you deactivate then update then reactivate to eliminate any possibility for errors
upgrade_notice.0.8.2: 0.8.2 Now using tax_query for WP_Query, should fix issues with Wordpress 4.4.1 update
upgrade_notice.0.8.0: 0.8.0 Allows you to schedule ads to expire after a set time. This update will update your existing ads by adding an end date to each.
upgrade_notice.0.6.4: 0.6.4 fixes some issues with the Ad Query making for a smarter ad picking system.
upgrade_notice.0.6: 0.6 is the first public release and submission for wordpress repo, nothing fancy here but might as well update.
upgrade_notice.0.5: 0.5 introduces Cosmetic Fixes, not required to update.
upgrade_notice.0.4: 0.4 introduces Major Fixes, you should update.
upgrade_notice.0.3: 0.3 introduces Major Fixes, you should update.
upgrade_notice.0.2: 0.2 Release adds support for YouTube videos.

screenshots.caption: Admin page for creating an ad, you will notice it looks familiar because it uses WordPress's Custom Post Types
